body.name: VERSKI LED Desk Lamp, Desk Light for Home Office, Architect Light, Eye-Caring Optical Lens,Table Lamp, 5 Color Modes & Brightness, Clamp Lamp with Memory Function for Drafting Reading Study, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 3 hrs 56 mins
features: 💡True eye-caring clamp desk lamp. Featuring advanced lighting technology, Fresnel optical lens and eye protection light source, double care for your eyes. High color rendering index (CRI>95) for the most accurate color presentation. Flicker-free and glare-free

💡Adjustable brightness & color temperature (3000-5500K), 4 preset light modes, easily creating the most comfortable lighting environment for your various usage scenarios. Suitable for office, workbench, reading room, painting, study, bedside table lighting, nail salon

💡Well fabricated, aluminum magnesium alloy material, minimalist and sturdy. Space-Saving with a versatile three-axis design, provide more larger lighting area. Metal clamp supports 2.7” desktop, wide installation range and save desktop space

💡Our desk lamp can be set to 15 mins before sleeping, then it will turn off automatically. Compatible with wall switches and smart plugs. The light will be on/off instantly when you control the light via wall switch or smart plug. The lamp also will remember your last setting(mode) when you turn it on next time

💡Highly efficient LED light source and will last a lifetime of 50,000 hours. No need to worry about changing light source. 1x Desk Lamp with clamp; 1x UL QC 3.0 Power Adapter; 1x User Manual. A 180 days money-back and a 36-month worry-free warranty. Any questions, please contact our seller support via Amazon and we will reponse by the earliest time

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why is our desk lamp slightly more expensive than others. It's because we use higher quality LED bulbs and a special optical structure. Our product is made with more solid materials, making the entire lamp about 0.5 pounds heavier than competing products, which is a reflection of our product's quality. In addition, with the complimentary QC3.0 fast charging power adapter we provide, in reality, our product is even more cost-effective compared to competitors. You need not hesitate. In fact, once you have our product in hand, your only regret might be not not having it sooner.

Why we choose the color temperature of 3000K-5500K. For ture eye-caring desk lamps, the most suitable color temperature is 3000K-5500K, and if the color temperature exceeds 5500K, long-term use will cause eye fatigue. If it exceeds 6500K, it will cause corresponding damage to eyesight.

Why we use Fresnel optical lens. The high-quality LED chips (CRI>95) are nicely diffused through Fresnel optical lens, this ensures a more even and transparent light, and also make you feel more comfortable when using.

Why we use a USB powered method. The USB powered method can be widely compatible with your computer, laptop, power bank, and other devices, eliminating the need for an AC power socket while working remotely or traveling. Additionally, we provide a complimentary QC3.0 power adapter, giving you the flexibility to choose the most suitable power supply method. If you use the USB port directly, the extra QC3.0 power adapter can be used to charge your electronic devices. In short, it's a convenient solution that takes care of both aspects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice desk lamp, and I like it a lot. It is light weight but made really well, and has a lot of great features. The packaging is also designed to protect the lamp during shipment, and all the included parts. were received in perfect condition. If you are looking for a new desk lamp, I would definitely recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just buy it and check it yourself! great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worthwhile upgrade to LED from old fluorescent desk lamp.
reviews.reviewText: I've been running my old and trusty IKEA compact fluorescent model desk lamp for over 2 decades!It just continues to soldier on and on. The thing is bulkier, and it does produce some heat off it that I can 'smell' due to the plastics surrounding it. It also consumes more power at 13W for its light output.After one utility power outage that lasted for many hours in the evening, I was forever sold on LED lighting fixtures for desks and personal space. Why? Because they mostly operate from 5VDC 2A wall warts. When we lost power, I was able to plug all these types of lights to my powerbanks and my home stayed illuminates as normal. What a big advantage! No more sitting in the dark with flashlights or candles.Enter the VERSKI LED multi-color temperature desk lamp. It looks identical in concept as my old IKEA lamp, the movable arms, desk clamp. But a sleek slender fresnel lens equipped head! AND 5VDC operation. When it arrived, I was impressed by the build quality and design. Very handsome light design. And easy to assemble and deploy. The quality of light, its choice, made the working environment more pleasing. I didn't know I needed it until I pulled the trigger to upgrade to LED. This lamp exceeded my expectations for quality and performance! Two thumbs up to VERSKI.What of the old IKEA? Perhaps relegate it to garage duty until it finally croaks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Space saving, highly customizable
reviews.reviewText: This lamp attaches to the desk with a cushioned clamp, and takes up very little real estate on the desk surface. Visually, though, it is quite large and can reach over half the width of my desk, so if you're looking for something more subtle, this is not it; however, the modern/industrial aesthetic works well for my room, so I like it.The major pro of this lamp is that there five different spots on this lamp where you can adjust the tilt/angle, so if you are finicky about how you want your work space lit, this is the product for you. There are also 4 lighting modes, which can each be made brighter or dimmer. However, the downside is that the lamp does NOT remember the last setting you used. So, if you turn it on night light mode because your partner is sleeping, but then you turn it off and then back on, it can be a little shocking. That's why I docked one star. It would have been better to either design this lamp to remember your last setting or make the first setting the dimmest mode before you cycle to the brighter modes.The indicator light on the switch is also quite bright and can interfere with sleep, but there is actually a way to toggle that off, which is a thoughtful design touch. The lamp does not feel noticeably hot after use, which is also very nice.All in all, with the minor exception of not remembering your last setting, this lamp is well-designed, looks good, and is a pleasure to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite the space saver!
reviews.reviewText: My desk isn't large with all the other monitors and risers that I have situated so I needed a LED lamp that was clamp-form. This one is so well-built, takes up barely any space and offers plenty of light coverage. I'm glad it offers multiple color hues as I prefer warm-white and I love how I can easily fold away if I don't want to use it. As for aesthetics, I don't think it's the best looking lamp because the body is multi-folds/zig zag like but it's functional. It's a great desk lamp and saves desk space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent build quality
reviews.reviewText: Super nice desk lamp, have bought a few of these now and the quality for price is on point. Would definitely recommend at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really love lamp!
reviews.reviewText: This light looks sharp! It comes well packaged and is very easy to set up. It is made with an obvious attention to detail. It moves with smoothness, swivels, bends, and holds its position to shine light wherever you need it. Not only that, but you can change the temperature of the lamp and choose the brightness. The one other thing I want to mention is that it fades on/off. That was a surprise, and it really adds such a nice touch. This really feels like a very expensive light. I love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent desk light. The articulating arm makes it easy to move around and use, and it looks pretty dope doing it. I appreciate the multiple settings, especially the one that creates a softer and more natural light. This was easy to install on my desk, and it gets used every day. If there was one thing I would change, and it doesn't even require the loss of a star, would be to move the switch mechanism onto the arm so it doesn't dangle off the edge of the desk.
